name: ai-qa-test-generator
description: AI-powered QA test case generator with Xray integration

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
